verses.name: 1 Chronicles 15:1
verses.text: And David made him houses in the city of David, and prepared a place for the ark of God, and pitched for it a tent.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 15:2
verses.text: Then David said, None ought to carry the ark of God but the Levites: for them hath the Lord chosen to carry the ark of God, and to minister unto him for ever.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 15:3
verses.text: And David gathered all Israel together to Jerusalem, to bring up the ark of the Lord unto his place, which he had prepared for it.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 15:4
verses.text: And David assembled the children of Aaron, and the Levites:
